title: Bedcover, "A.S.M. Da Isabel 2a La Espana Industrial 1860", ca. 1860
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp:  231 cm [91"]    Hem at top & fringe on bottom.
Weft:   208 cm [82"]     Fringe on both sides included.
Two panels seamed down center, panel selvedge to selvedge is 84 cm [33"].
creditline: Museum purchase from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Fund
description: Printed in brown, black, blue and two purples. Central repeating medallion of a family ringed with flowers and smaller portraits of men running down both edges.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, "A.S.M. Da Isabel 2a La Espana Industrial 1860", ca. 1860.
ca. 1860. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Museum purchase from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Fund. 1993-91-1.
